post.title: Architecture Update Online
post.content: I just noticed that the inaugural Microsoft Architecture Update newsletter is posted online. We handed out hardcopies @ the PDC. There’s a little piece in there on our community efforts by yours truly. Thankfully, my horrific picture didn’t make it into the online version. I’m actually going to have an “official” (read: good) picture of me taken for future use at some point.
